name: Crazy Birds!
description:
----------------------------

Adaptation of flash games and just a time killer! Here you can play with friends or just kill your time by killing pigs for one of the provided characters #fangame #adventure #arcade #angrybirds

ALL CHATACTER/BIRDS:

Red,Chuck,Blues

SPECIAL:Pig

HOW TO PLAY:

When you enter the game, you will get to the team logo,

wait a little and see the disclaimer, after the disclaimer press enter (unless of course you have read everything), you are in the main menu, there are two modes in this game:the usual and the second is together, in normal mode you will be alone and in the second with your friend, when you get into the game you need to shoot pigs with the letter z, and if you play together, then 1 player on z and the second on x

Have a nice game!

Join our discord:
https://discord.gg/cm4XY99e4P
We will publish news

Additional tags:
